title: how do i make google assistant stop using certain apps?
content:
when i say "play X song by Y" google assistant always tries to open the song in pandora. i do not have a pandora premium account, so it just plays some random song that is sort of related to the one i wanted. however, if i say "play X song by Y on youtube" it plays the right song every time.

how do i tell my google assistant to stop using pandora? i dont want it to use pandora ever.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
